thread.section_title: Rome Life Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Comforts of Home
thread.title_full: Comforts of Home - Review of Rome Life Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: waynen95
title: Comforts of Home
text:
Stayed for 3 nights and the hotel is in a quiet location just minutes from the Colosseum, Trevi Fountain, Roman Forum and Baths odf Diocletian as well as 7 minutes from Termini train Station. Great restaurants just outside and 1 1/2 blocks from a market if you want to get some wine and pack a romantic picnic lunch.
Staff are tremendous, very clean and updated rooms with a great breakfast.
